Text: REYPO Navy Fly Away Assignmentrespond to rnstnhgnPlease reply to this email to let us know if we have your correct email address The Navy Fly Away Committee

YPO Navy Fly Away Assignmentrespond to rnstnhgnGreetings You are ordered to report to the Naval Air Station at Coronado Island California for the December Navy Fly Away The Navy has not yet set the date but we have been told that the trip will either be December or December Please block out these dates on your calendar now We need a deposit in the amount of mailed to us on or before April to secure your spot on the trip Make your check payable to YPO Navy Fly Away Mail payment to Roy Steinhagen PO Box Beaumont Tx We will be in contact with you soon with additional information regarding the trip and we will also be sending out a participant information survey form which you will need to return promptly Congratulations on clearing the lottery
